About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

Hi, I am Krati Jain, pursuing Computer Science Engineering in Shri Govindram Seksaria Institute Of Technology and Science. I am currently working on tech stack with the backend functionality. I had knowledge of Flutter dev, Dart, HTML, CSS, SCSS, Bootstrap and few frameworks.

Project

Andorid App Development

Coronout- In which I had developed a app which involve functioning of how to track number of covid cases around globe. Also with the functionality of donating our part to the society by providing items to the needy with introductory blockchain functionality.

Workshop

Electronics

Conducted workshop for batchmates and juniors in which we built a robotic arm along with the app controlling the functionality of robotic arm.

Webworks

Programmer

Working on my coding skills and participating in contest on various platforms including Codechef, Leetcode, Codeforces and many more. Also I had started a video series in which working on coding with community upliftment was the major aim.
